statements: SELECT * FROM advertising_expenditures;
SELECT company_name, expenditure_amount, media_type FROM advertising_expenditures ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE media_type='TV' AND expenditure_amount > 5000;
SELECT company_name, media_type FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount < 1000 ORDER BY expenditure_amount ASC;
SELECT MAX(expenditure_amount) AS max_expenditure FROM advertising_expenditures;
SELECT company_name, media_type, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE company_name='ABC Corp' ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC;
SELECT media_type, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE media_type='TV' GROUP BY media_type;
SELECT company_name, media_type, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000 AND media_type='Print' ORDER BY expenditure_amount ASC;
SELECT company_name, media_type, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE media_type IN ('Online', 'Radio') ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM advertising_expenditures;
SELECT * FROM advertising_expenditures ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC;
SELECT media_company, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_scrutiny WHERE regulator = 'FDA';
SELECT id, regulator, timestamp FROM regulatory_scrutiny WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, description, timestamp FROM regulatory_scrutiny ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, media_company, expenditure_amount, timestamp FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_scrutiny WHERE regulator = 'FDA' AND approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, regulator, description FROM regulatory_scrutiny WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT AVG(expenditure_amount) AS average_expenditure FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT media_company, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM advertising_expenditures GROUP BY media_company ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT company_name, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM advertising_companies WHERE industry = 'Technology'
SELECT company_name, media_platform FROM advertising_expenditures ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC
SELECT company_name, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE media_platform = 'TV' AND expenditure_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA'
SELECT company_name, media_platform, expenditure_amount FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_expenditures WHERE media_platform = 'TV' AND expenditure_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY expenditure_amount ASC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM advertising_expenditures GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_expenditure > 5000 ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC;

SELECT ac.company_name, ac.industry, ae.media_platform, ae.expenditure_amount FROM advertising_companies ac JOIN advertising_expenditures ae ON ac.company_name = ae.company_name WHERE ae.expenditure_amount > 2000 ORDER BY ae.expenditure_amount DESC;

SELECT ra.agency_name, COUNT(ac.company_id) AS num_companies FROM regulatory_agencies ra LEFT JOIN advertising_companies ac ON ra.agency_name = ac.industry GROUP BY ra.agency_name HAVING num_companies > 2 ORDER BY num_companies DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry, headquarters_location FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry = 'Broadcasting';
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM Media_Companies WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Regulatory_Scrutiny WHERE scrutiny_status = 'Under Review' ORDER BY scrutiny_date;
SELECT company_name, revenue, headquarters_location FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry = 'Publication' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Media_Companies WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry = 'Broadcasting' AND headquarters_location LIKE '%New%';

SELECT company_name, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM Media_Companies JOIN Advertising_Expenditures ON Media_Companies.id = Advertising_Expenditures.company_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC;

SELECT company_name, scrutiny_date, scrutiny_status FROM Media_Companies JOIN Regulatory_Scrutiny ON Media_Companies.id = Regulatory_Scrutiny.company_id WHERE scrutiny_status = 'Under Review' ORDER BY scrutiny_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_company;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM media_company;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaign;
SELECT * FROM advertising_expenditure WHERE expenditure_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, agency_id FROM campaign_agency;
SELECT * FROM media_company;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaign WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT expenditure_id, expenditure_amount, expenditure_date FROM advertising_expenditure ORDER BY expenditure_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM media_company WHERE company_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_agency JOIN ad_agency ON campaign_agency.agency_id = ad_agency.agency_id WHERE campaign_agency.campaign_id = 3;
